name: Bloody Heaven
description:
Brief


Irene was banished from Heaven for her crime of loving an angle. In Irene's revenge for the Heaven, she picks up weapons from the Hell and is going to make blood floods in the Heaven.
In Bloody Heaven, you will execute your revenge to demons and collect shards from them to trade for magic items and powerful equipment. Use melee weapon to slay enemies, or range weapon to make accurate kills, or use elemental weapon to deal AOE damage. Your battle style totally depends on your choice. Step by step push to the final battle ground and challenge all your battle skill to beat the final Boss.

Rune is power

You can save as much runes as possible in early game, so that make the best use of 'Interest' system. That will give you a great amount of runes in late game to spend on expensive and powerful weapons. However, saving could definitely make your early game like dancing on the edge of a knife.

Variety of Weapons


Weapons can be classified as 3 major types, melee, range and elemental weapon. Rare weapons has unique functions or skills.





Spend Shards in A Smart Way


You can spend shards between waves to upgrade your stats, or get special effects that can change your battle style.


BackFire System


Every weapon has its own personality, feel it's power and rhyme. Press 'BackFire' at the moment you sync with your weapon, then it will release the true power of the weapon.
